para1: Your presence on the day really is the most important thing to us and we appreciate that many of you will be travelling a long distance to be with us so there really is no need to get us anything. However, some of you have asked us what we would like by way of a gift and so we have created a Gift List at El Corte Ingl√©s:
para2: The site is in Spanish but if you click on the "Buy from a Gift List" box on the top right hand side, you will be taken to a page in English where you can search for our list by entering one of our names.
